item.title: Aspose.Slides for Android via Java 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes forÂ Aspose.Slides for Android via Java 24.1 Key Summary Category SLIDESANDROID-447 Use Aspose.Slides for Java 24.1 features Enhancement Public API Changes PDF import detect tables option added The PdfImportOptions.DetectTables option has been added to ensure that when importing PDF tables are automatically detected and imported as a table in Slide. Below is an example of PDF import with tables detecting:
